analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe / nem nur du 'gyur / rmongs par 'gyur /

analyzed: yongs su brtag pa ma byas te /

original: nyi ma gcig gam /
analyzed: nyi ma gcig gam /

original: gnyis sam / gsum mam /
analyzed: gnyis sam / gsum mam /

original: bzhi 'am / lngar rjes su ma 'brangs na /
analyzed: bzhi 'am / lngar rjes su ma 'brangs na /

original: gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dra zhing rtog pa dang / nyi ma gcig gam /üîΩgnyis sam / gsum mam /

analyzed: ldan par 'gyur ro //

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: rab 'byor / de ni de ltar yang 'gyur te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni de ltar yang 'gyur te /

analyzed: gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su ma dris /

original: yongs su ma brtags /
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags /

original: rjes su 'brang ba ma byas pa de ni /
analyzed: rjes su 'brang ba ma byas pa de ni /

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mnyan pa la de tsam gyis dge ba'i bsam pa dang / mos pa skye bar 'gyur te /üîΩde ni bar bar mos shing /

original: bar bar mos pa med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: bar bar mos pa med par 'gyur te /

original: de ni ldam ldem gyi blo des 'phrogs shing /
analyzed: de ni ldam ldem gyi blo des 'phrogs shing /

analyzed: shing bal gyi gzegs ma bzhin du 'gyur ro //

analyzed: rab 'byor / gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de ni yun ring po nas theg pa la zhugs pa ma yin par rig par bya ste /

analyzed: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su ma bzung ba'o //

analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur ma byas pa'o //

original: rab 'byor / gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'i lung ma mnos /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'i lung ma mnos /

analyzed: kha ton du ma byas la tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas te /

original: des ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs so //
analyzed: des ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs so //

analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs so //

analyzed: tshul khrims kyi @292b pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs so //

analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs so // nang stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so //

original: phyi stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so //

analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so //

analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so //

analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so // dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so //

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so //

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so //

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so //üîΩmi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so //

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so //üîΩngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so //

analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so //

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la ma bslabs so //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la ma bslabs so //

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams la ma bslabs so //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams la ma bslabs so //

analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la ma bslabs so // dbang po rnams la ma bslabs so //

original: stobs rnams la ma bslabs so //
analyzed: stobs rnams la ma bslabs so //

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la ma bslabs so //üîΩ'phags pa'i lam yan lag @293a *//
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la ma bslabs so // 'phags pa'i lam yan lag @293a *//

original: brgyad pa la ma bslabs so //üîΩ'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la ma bslabs so //
analyzed: brgyad pa la ma bslabs so // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la ma bslabs so //

original: bsam gtan rnams la ma bslabs so //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams la ma bslabs so //
translated: I have not trained in the concentrations.

original: tshad med pa rnams la ma bslabs so //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams la ma bslabs so //

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la ma bslabs so //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la ma bslabs so //

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad la ma bslabs so //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad la ma bslabs so //

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la ma bslabs so //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la ma bslabs so //

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la ma bslabs so //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la ma bslabs so //
translated: I have not trained in the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are doors to liberation.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams la ma bslabs so //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams la ma bslabs so //
translated: I have not trained in the clairvoyances.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams la ma bslabs so //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams la ma bslabs so //
translated: they have not trained in the meditative stabilities;

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la ma bslabs so //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la ma bslabs so //
translated: they have not trained in the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ gateways;

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la ma bslabs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la ma bslabs so //
translated: they have not trained in the ten powers of the tathƒÅgatas;

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi la ma bslabs so //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi la ma bslabs so //
translated: they have not trained in the four assurances;

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la ma bslabs so //üîΩbyams pa chen po la ma bslabs so //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la ma bslabs so // byams pa chen po la ma bslabs so //
translated: they have not trained in the four kinds of exact knowledge;üîΩthey have not trained in great loving kindness;

original: snying rje chen po la ma bslabs so //
analyzed: snying rje chen po la ma bslabs so //
translated: they have not trained in great compassion;

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la ma bslabs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la ma bslabs so //
translated: they have not trained in the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas;

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la ma bslabs so //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la ma bslabs so //
translated: they have not trained in the fruit of entering the stream;

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la ma bslabs so //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la ma bslabs so //
translated: they have not trained in the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth;

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la ma bslabs so //üîΩdgra bcom pa nyid la ma bslabs so //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la ma bslabs so // dgra bcom pa nyid la ma bslabs so //
translated: they have not trained in the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth;üîΩthey have not trained in arhatship;

original: rang byang chub la ma bslabs so //
analyzed: rang byang chub la ma bslabs so //
translated: they have not trained in individual enlightenment;

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la ma bslabs so //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la ma bslabs so //
translated: they have not trained in the knowledge of path aspects;

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen @293b pa nyid la ma bslabs so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen @293b pa nyid la ma bslabs so //
translated: they have not trained in the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rab 'byor / gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs par rig par bya ste /
translated: ‚ÄúSubh≈´ti, you should know that those persons who are followers of the vehicle of the bodhisattvas are beginners in the vehicle.

original: de ni dad pa tsam dang / dga' ba tsam dang / mos pa tsam dang ldan par zad de //
analyzed: de ni dad pa tsam dang / dga' ba tsam dang / mos pa tsam dang ldan par zad de //
translated: They have only faith, only joy, and only aspiration.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'am /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'am /
translated: They are not able to write out this deep perfection of wisdom,

original: klog pa'am / lung 'bog pa'am /
analyzed: klog pa'am / lung 'bog pa'am /
translated: or to study it,

original: kha ton du bya ba'am /
analyzed: kha ton du bya ba'am /
translated: or to take it up,

original: tshul bzhin du yid la bya bar mi nus so //
analyzed: tshul bzhin du yid la bya bar mi nus so //
translated: or to properly pay attention to it.üîΩ‚ÄúSubh≈´ti, those sons of a good family or daughters of a good family who are followers of the vehicle of the bodhisattvas do not write out this deep perfection of wisdom,üîΩdo not study it,üîΩdo not take it up,

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mi 'dri zhing lung mi 'bog pa dang / kha ton mi byed cing tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mi 'dri zhing lung mi 'bog pa dang / kha ton mi byed cing tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed la /
translated: do not properly pay attention to it,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /üîΩbzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / nang stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / nang stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /
translated: It is not that this profound transcendent perfection of wisdom does not benefit others, nor is it that the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration does not benefit others, nor is it that the transcendent perfection of perseverance does not benefit others,üîΩnor is it that the transcendent perfection of tolerance does not benefit others, nor is it that the transcendent perfection of ethical discipline does not benefit others, nor is it that the transcendent perfection of generosity does not benefit others, nor is it that inner emptiness does not benefit others,

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la @294a *//
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la @294a *//
translated: nor is it that outer emptiness does not benefit others, nor is it that inner and outer emptiness does not benefit others, nor is it that the emptiness of emptiness does not benefit others,

original: phan mi 'dogs pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /
analyzed: phan mi 'dogs pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /
translated: The emptiness of the conditioned does not benefit others.üîΩThe emptiness of the unconditioned does not benefit others.üîΩThe emptiness of what is beyond extremes does not benefit others.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /
translated: The emptiness of what is beginningless and endless does not benefit others.üîΩThe emptiness of what is not to be discarded does not benefit others.üîΩThe emptiness of nature does not benefit others.üîΩThe emptiness of all phenomena does not benefit others.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /
translated: The emptiness of defining characteristics does not benefit others.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /
translated: emptiness of nonobservation does not benefit others, emptiness of the nature of nonthings does not benefit others, emptiness of the essential nature does not benefit others, and emptiness of the essential nature of nonthings does not benefit others.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rkang pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa @294b dang / dbang po rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rkang pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa @294b dang / dbang po rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /
translated: the applications of mindfulness do not benefit others, the right efforts do not benefit others, the legs of miraculous power do not benefit others, the faculties do not benefit others,

original: stobs rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /
analyzed: stobs rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /
translated: the powers do not benefit others, the branches of enlightenment do not benefit others, the eightfold noble path does not benefit others, the noble truths do not benefit others,

original: bsam gtan rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / tshad med pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / tshad med pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /
translated: the meditative stabilities do not benefit others, the immeasurables do not benefit others, the formless meditative stabilizations do not benefit others, the eight deliverances do not benefit others,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /
translated: It is not to benefit others through the forms of preternatural knowledge.üîΩIt is not to benefit others through the meditative stabilities.üîΩIt is not to benefit others through the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ gateways.üîΩIt is not to benefit others through the ten powers of the tathƒÅgatas.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /
translated: It is not to benefit others through the four forms of fearlessness.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / byams pa @295a *//
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / byams pa @295a *//
translated: It is not to benefit others through the four kinds of exact knowledge.üîΩIt is not to benefit others through the four forms of correct understanding.

original: chen pos gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / snying rje chen pos gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /
analyzed: chen pos gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / snying rje chen pos gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /
translated: the result of stream enterer does not benefit others,üîΩthe result of once-returner does not benefit others,üîΩthe result of non-returner does not benefit others,üîΩthe state of a worthy one does not benefit others,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / rang byang chub kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / rang byang chub kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /
translated: a pratyekabuddha‚Äôs awakening does not benefit others,üîΩthe knowledge of path aspects does not benefit others,üîΩthe knowledge of all aspects does not benefit others,

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par mi spyod /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par mi spyod /
translated: and they do not practice in accordance with the perfection of wisdom.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par mi spyod /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par mi spyod /
translated: They do not practice in accord with the perfection of meditative concentration.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par mi spyod /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par mi spyod /
translated: They do not practice in accord with the perfection of perseverance.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par mi spyod /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par mi spyod /
translated: They do not practice in accord with the perfection of patience.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par mi spyod /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par mi spyod /
translated: They do not practice in accord with the perfection of discipline.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par mi spyod /üîΩnang stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par mi spyod / nang stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod /
translated: They do not practice in accord with the perfection of generosity.üîΩThey do not practice in accord with inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod /
translated: They do not practice in accord with outer emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod /
translated: They do not practice in accord with inner and outer emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod /
translated: They do not practice in accord with the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid dang mthun par @295b mi spyod /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid dang mthun par @295b mi spyod /
translated: They do not practice in accord with great emptiness.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod /üîΩ'dus byas stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod /
translated: They do not practice in accord with ultimate emptiness.üîΩThey do not practice in accord with conditioned emptiness.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod /
translated: They do not practice in accord with unconditioned emptiness.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod /üîΩthog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage in accordance with the emptiness of the unlimited.üîΩThey do not engage in accordance with the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage in accordance with the emptiness of non-dispersal.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage in accordance with the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage in accordance with the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod /üîΩmi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage in accordance with the emptiness of its own characteristics.üîΩThey do not engage in accordance with the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod /üîΩngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage in accordance with the emptiness of non-entities.üîΩThey do not engage in accordance with the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage in accordance with the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang mthun par mi spyod /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang mthun par mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage in accordance with the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang mthun par mi spyod /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang mthun par mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage in accordance with the right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang mthun par mi spyod /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang mthun par mi spyod /
translated: They do not practice in accord with the bases of miraculous power.

original: dbang po rnams dang mthun par mi spyod /
analyzed: dbang po rnams dang mthun par mi spyod /
translated: They do not practice in accord with the faculties.

original: stobs rnams dang mthun par mi spyod /
analyzed: stobs rnams dang mthun par mi spyod /
translated: They do not practice in accord with the powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang mthun par mi spyod /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang mthun par mi spyod /
translated: They do not practice in accord with the branches of awakening.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang mthun par mi spyod /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang mthun par mi spyod /
translated: They do not practice in accord with the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang mthun par mi spyod /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang mthun par mi spyod /
translated: They do not practice in accord with the truths.

original: bsam gtan rnams dang mthun par mi spyod /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams dang mthun par mi spyod /
translated: They do not practice in accord with the concentrations.

original: tshad med pa rnams dang mthun par mi spyod /üîΩgzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa @296a *//
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams dang mthun par mi spyod / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa @296a *//
translated: They do not practice in accord with the immeasurables.

original: rnams dang mthun par mi spyod /
analyzed: rnams dang mthun par mi spyod /
translated: They do not practice in accord with the formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang mthun par mi spyod /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang mthun par mi spyod /
translated: They do not practice in accord with the eight deliverances.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang mthun par mi spyod /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang mthun par mi spyod /
translated: They do not practice in accord with the nine serial absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang mthun par mi spyod /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang mthun par mi spyod /
translated: They do not practice in accord with the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are doors to deliverance.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams dang mthun par mi spyod /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams dang mthun par mi spyod /
translated: They do not practice in accord with the superknowledges.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams dang mthun par mi spyod /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams dang mthun par mi spyod /
translated: They do not practice in accord with the meditative stabilizations.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang mthun par mi spyod /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang mthun par mi spyod /
translated: They do not practice in accord with the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mthun par mi spyod /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mthun par mi spyod /
translated: They do not practice in accord with the ten powers of the tathƒÅgatas.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang mthun par mi spyod /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang mthun par mi spyod /
translated: They do not practice in accord with the four fearlessnesses.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang mthun par mi spyod /üîΩbyams pa chen po dang mthun par mi spyod /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang mthun par mi spyod / byams pa chen po dang mthun par mi spyod /
translated: They do not practice in accord with the four detailed and thorough knowledges.üîΩThey do not practice in accord with great love.

original: snying rje chen po dang mthun par mi spyod /
analyzed: snying rje chen po dang mthun par mi spyod /
translated: They do not practice in accord with great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang mthun par mi spyod /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang mthun par mi spyod /
translated: They do not practice in accord with the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang mthun par mi spyod /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang mthun par mi spyod /
translated: They do not practice in accord with the result of stream enterer.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang mthun par mi spyod /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang mthun par mi spyod /
translated: They do not practice in accord with the result of once-returner.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang mthun par mi spyod /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang mthun par mi spyod /
translated: They do not practice in accord with the result of non-returner.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod /
translated: They do not practice in accord with the state of a worthy one.

original: rang byang chub dang mthun par mi spyod /
analyzed: rang byang chub dang mthun par mi spyod /
translated: They do not practice in accordance with the level of a pratyekabuddha,

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod /
translated: they do not practice in accordance with the knowledge of path aspects,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod na /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod na /
translated: and they do not practice in accordance with the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ni gnas gnyis dang / sa gnyis po las sa gcig la gnas par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ni gnas gnyis dang / sa gnyis po las sa gcig la gnas par 'gyur te /
translated: ‚ÄúThey will stand on one of two levels or two grounds,

original: de ni 'di ltar nyan @296b thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar nyan @296b thos kyi sa'am /
translated: namely, the ≈õrƒÅvaka level

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o //
translated: or the pratyekabuddha level.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ma dris /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ma dris /
translated: It is because those sons of a good family or daughters of a good family have not in the past asked questions about this deep perfection of wisdom,

original: ma bstan / kha ton du ma byas /
analyzed: ma bstan / kha ton du ma byas /
translated: have not taught it, have not recited it,

original: tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phan ma btags /
analyzed: tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phan ma btags /
translated: have not properly paid attention to it, and have not helped the perfection of wisdom.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang mthun par mi spyad pas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang mthun par mi spyad pas /
translated: Those sons of a good family or daughters of a good family in the Bodhisattva Vehicle who do not practice in accordance with this perfection of wisdom

original: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des gnas gnyis dang / sa gnyis po de las gcig la gnas par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o //üîΩshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /
analyzed: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des gnas gnyis dang / sa gnyis po de las gcig la gnas par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /
translated: should be known as standing between the two abodes and the two levels.

original: le'u sum cu bzhi pa'o ////
analyzed: le'u sum cu bzhi pa'o ////
translated: From the Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines, Chapter Thirty-Four

original: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
translated: Subh≈´ti, it is like this:

original: dper na / rgya mtsho'i dbus su gru zhig la mi rnams shing ngam /üîΩshing dum mam /
analyzed: dper na / rgya mtsho'i dbus su gru zhig la mi rnams shing ngam / shing dum mam /
translated: For example, if people in a boat in the middle of the ocean do not take hold of a log,üîΩa piece of wood,

original: shing leb bam /
analyzed: shing leb bam /
translated: a plank,

original: rkyal pa'am / ro la mi 'ju /üîΩmi 'dzin na /
analyzed: rkyal pa'am / ro la mi 'ju / mi 'dzin na /

original: rab 'byor / mi de dag ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / mi de dag ni /
translated: Subh≈´ti, you should know that those people

analyzed: rgya mtsho chen po'i pha rol gyi 'gram du ma phyin par dus byed par rig par bya'o //
translated: will not reach the other shore of the great ocean and will die.

original: rab 'byor / mi gang rgya mtsho'i dbus su gru zhig pa'i tshe /üîΩshing ngam / shing dum mam /
analyzed: rab 'byor / mi gang rgya mtsho'i dbus su gru zhig pa'i tshe / shing ngam / shing dum mam /

analyzed: shing leb bam /

original: rkyal pa'am / ro la 'ju zhing 'dzin pa de dag ni rgya mtshor dus byed par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: rkyal pa'am / ro la 'ju zhing 'dzin pa de dag ni rgya mtshor dus byed par mi 'gyur te /
translated: will not perish in the ocean.

original: bde zhing nyam nyos med par rgya mtsho chen po nas pha rol gyi 'gram du phyin par @297a *//
analyzed: bde zhing nyam nyos med par rgya mtsho chen po nas pha rol gyi 'gram du phyin par @297a *//
translated: They will safely and securely reach the other shore of the great ocean.

original: 'gyur te / ma nyes ma nyams par thad la phyin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'gyur te / ma nyes ma nyams par thad la phyin par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will reach the shore without injury or loss.

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa tsam dang / dga' ba tsam dang / mos pa tsam dang ldan pa gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mi 'dri mi ston /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa tsam dang / dga' ba tsam dang / mos pa tsam dang ldan pa gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mi 'dri mi ston /
translated: Subh≈´ti, in the same way, those sons of a good family or daughters of a good family in the Bodhisattva Vehicle who, though they have only faith, only devotion, and only aspiration, do not write out, do not teach,

original: kha ton du mi byed /
analyzed: kha ton du mi byed /

analyzed: bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / dga' ba dang / spro ba dang / mi gtong ba'ang yod cing /

analyzed: de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dad pa yod /

original: de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang /

translated: Therefore, they are embraced by the perfection of wisdom, embraced by the perfection of concentration, embraced by the perfection of perseverance, embraced by the perfection of patience,

translated: embraced by the perfection of morality, embraced by the perfection of giving, embraced by inner emptiness,

original: yongs su bzung ba dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /
translated: embraced by outer emptiness, embraced by inner and outer emptiness, embraced by the emptiness of emptiness, embraced by great emptiness,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /

translated: It is embraced by the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, and the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /
translated: It is embraced by the emptiness of what is beyond extremes, the emptiness of what is not to be discarded, the emptiness of nature, and the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /üîΩdngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pas yongs su bzung ba dang / yang dag par spong bas yongs su bzung ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas yongs su bzung ba dang /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pas yongs su bzung ba dang / yang dag par spong bas yongs su bzung ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas yongs su bzung ba dang /
translated: It is embraced by the emptiness of defining characteristics, the emptiness of nonobservation, the emptiness of nonentities, the emptiness of essential nature,üîΩand the emptiness of the essential nature of nonentities. It is embraced by the applications of mindfulness, the right efforts, the legs of miraculous power,

original: dbang pos yongs su bzung ba dang / stobs kyis yongs su bzung @300b ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gis yongs su bzung ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su bzung ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pas yongs su bzung ba dang /
analyzed: dbang pos yongs su bzung ba dang / stobs kyis yongs su bzung @300b ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gis yongs su bzung ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su bzung ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pas yongs su bzung ba dang /
translated: the faculties, the powers, the branches of awakening, the noble eightfold path, the noble truths,

original: bsam gtan gyis yongs su bzung ba dang / tshad med pas yongs su bzung ba dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pas yongs su bzung ba dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su bzung ba dang /

translated: It is to be embraced by the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ gateways.

analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas yongs su bzung ba dang / mngon par shes pas yongs su bzung ba dang / ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung ba dang / gzungs kyi sgos yongs su bzung ba dang /
translated: It is to be embraced by the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su bzung ba dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang / byams pa chen pos yongs su bzung ba dang / snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung ba dang /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su bzung ba dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang / byams pa chen pos yongs su bzung ba dang / snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung ba dang /
translated: They are protected by the ten powers of the tathƒÅgatas, protected by the four fearlessnesses, protected by the four detailed and thorough knowledges, protected by great love, protected by great compassion,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dras pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dras pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas /
translated: protected by the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, protected by the knowledge of all aspects, protected by the knowledge of path aspects, and protected by the knowledge of all the aspects of that.

original: bar ma dor nye zho med par nyan thos kyi sa las 'das /
analyzed: bar ma dor nye zho med par nyan thos kyi sa las 'das /
translated: They do not get into trouble in the interim and go beyond the ≈õrƒÅvaka level,

original: @301a *// rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das te /
analyzed: @301a *// rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das te /
translated: go beyond the pratyekabuddha level,

original: sems can yongs su smin par byas nas /
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par byas nas /
translated: bring beings to maturity,

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas te /
translated: and purify a buddhafield.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: they will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
translated: Subh≈´ti, it is like this:

original: dper na / bud med dam skyes pa la la zhig bum pa ma bsregs shing /
analyzed: dper na / bud med dam skyes pa la la zhig bum pa ma bsregs shing /
translated: for example, a man or a woman thinks of filling a pot that has not been fired,

original: so ma btang bas chu bcu bar sems na /
analyzed: so ma btang bas chu bcu bar sems na /
translated: that has not been hardened, with water.

original: rab 'byor / bum pa de ni ring por mi gnas te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / bum pa de ni ring por mi gnas te /
translated: Subh≈´ti, that pot will not last long,

original: myur du 'gyes shing 'jig par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: myur du 'gyes shing 'jig par rig par bya'o //
translated: and you should know that it will quickly break and be destroyed.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de ni bum pa de so ma btang ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: de ni bum pa de so ma btang ba'i phyir te /
translated: It is because that pot has not been hardened,

original: de ni tha mar sa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni tha mar sa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: and in the end it will just become earth.

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag la'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir dad pa'ang yod /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag la'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir dad pa'ang yod /
translated: Subh≈´ti, in the same way, those sons of a good family or daughters of a good family in the Bodhisattva Vehicle have faith,

original: bzod pa'ang yod /üîΩmos pa'ang yod /
analyzed: bzod pa'ang yod / mos pa'ang yod /
translated: have patience,üîΩhave resolution,

original: lhag pa'i bsam pa'ang yod /
analyzed: lhag pa'i bsam pa'ang yod /
translated: have superior motivation,

original: dga' ba'ang yod /
analyzed: dga' ba'ang yod /
translated: They have joy,

original: spro ba'ang yod /üîΩmi gtong ba'ang yod /
analyzed: spro ba'ang yod / mi gtong ba'ang yod /
translated: they have delight,üîΩthey are not stingy,

original: brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba'ang yod mod kyi /
analyzed: brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba'ang yod mod kyi /
translated: and they do not give up their efforts.

original: de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /
translated: But they are not held by the perfection of wisdom,

original: thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung /
translated: they are not held by skillful means,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /üîΩbrtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /
translated: they are not held by the perfection of concentration,üîΩthey are not held by the perfection of perseverance,

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin @301b pas yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin @301b pas yongs su ma bzung /
translated: they are not held by the perfection of patience,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /
translated: they are not held by the perfection of morality,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /üîΩnang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /
translated: they are not held by the perfection of giving,üîΩthey are not held by inner emptiness,

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /üîΩphyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /
translated: they are not held by outer emptiness,üîΩthey are not held by inner and outer emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /
translated: they are not held by the emptiness of emptiness,

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /
translated: they are not held by great emptiness,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /üîΩ'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /
translated: It is not apprehended by the emptiness of the ultimate.üîΩIt is not apprehended by the emptiness of the conditioned.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /üîΩmtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /üîΩthog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /
translated: It is not apprehended by the emptiness of the unconditioned.üîΩIt is not apprehended by the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.üîΩIt is not apprehended by the emptiness of what is neither with nor without origination.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /
translated: It is not apprehended by the emptiness of what is not to be discarded.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /
translated: It is not apprehended by the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /üîΩrang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /
translated: It is not apprehended by the emptiness of all things.üîΩIt is not apprehended by the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /üîΩdngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /
translated: It is not apprehended by the emptiness of non-apprehension.üîΩIt is not apprehended by the emptiness of non-entities.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /
translated: It is not apprehended by the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /üîΩdran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /

original: dbang po rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: dbang po rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /

original: stobs rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: stobs rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su ma bzung /

analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /

analyzed: bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / tshad med pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /

analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /

analyzed: rnam pa thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung /

analyzed: mthar gyis @309b gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su ma bzung /

analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas yongs su ma bzung /

original: mngon pa shes pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /

translated: It is because they are not sustained by the perfection of wisdom, they are not sustained by skillful means, they are not sustained by the perfection of concentration, they are not sustained by the perfection of perseverance,

analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung @310a *//

original: ba dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang / nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang /
analyzed: ba dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang / nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang /
translated: they are not sustained by the perfection of generosity, they are not sustained by inner emptiness, they are not sustained by outer emptiness, they are not sustained by inner and outer emptiness,

analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang /
translated: It is not apprehended by the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.üîΩIt is not apprehended by the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.üîΩIt is not apprehended by the emptiness of beyond extremes.üîΩIt is not apprehended by the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang /

translated: It is not apprehended by the emptiness of non-discarded phenomena.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang /
translated: It is not apprehended by the emptiness of nature. It is not apprehended by the emptiness of all phenomena. It is not apprehended by the emptiness of its own mark. It is not apprehended by the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang /

translated: It is not apprehended by the emptiness of non-things. It is not apprehended by the emptiness of essential nature. It is not apprehended by the emptiness of the essential nature of non-things. It is not apprehended by the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / rdzu @310b 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / dbang po rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / stobs rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang /

translated: They are not embraced by the four right efforts, the four legs of miraculous action, the five faculties, the five powers,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang /

original: tshad med pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su ma bzung ba dang /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su ma bzung ba dang /
translated: It is not embraced by the immeasurables, it is not embraced by the formless absorptions, it is not embraced by the eight aspects of liberation, it is not embraced by the nine serial steps of meditative absorption,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang /

translated: it is not embraced by the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gateways to liberation, it is not embraced by the higher perceptions, it is not embraced by the meditative stabilities,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su ma bzung ba dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung ba dang /

translated: it is not embraced by the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ gateways, it is not embraced by the ten powers of the tathƒÅgatas, it is not embraced by the four assurances, it is not embraced by the four kinds of exact knowledge,üîΩand it is not embraced by the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.

original: byams pa chen pos yongs su ma bzung ba dang / snying rje chen pos yongs su ma bzung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung @311a *//
analyzed: byams pa chen pos yongs su ma bzung ba dang / snying rje chen pos yongs su ma bzung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung @311a *//
translated: because they are not embraced by the great love, they are not embraced by the great compassion, they are not embraced by the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,

original: ba dang / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ba dang / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba'i phyir ro //

analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /

analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /

analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /

analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /

analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung /

analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su bzung /

analyzed: bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su bzung / tshad med pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung /

analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung /

analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su bzung /

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su bzung /

analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /

analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /

analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /

analyzed: dbang po rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /

original: stobs rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: stobs rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /

analyzed: 'phags pa'i @314b bden pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /

analyzed: bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /

original: tshad med pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /

analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung /

analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su ma bzung /

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas yongs su ma bzung /

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /

analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /

analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /

analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /
translated: He is not embraced by the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ gateways.

analyzed: de @317a *// bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su ma bzung /

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung /

original: snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung ba /

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su bzung ba /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su bzung ba /

analyzed: rab 'byor / ji ltar na gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba yin zhe na /

analyzed: 'di la sbyin pa yongs su gtang ngo snyam du mi sems so // 'di ltar bdag ni tshul khrims srung ngo //

analyzed: tshul khrims ni 'di srung ngo snyam du mi sems so //

original: 'di ltar bdag ni bzod pa sgom mo //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag ni bzod pa sgom mo //

analyzed: bzod pa ni 'di sgom mo snyam du mi sems so // 'di ltar bdag ni brtson 'grus rtsom mo //

analyzed: brtson 'grus ni 'di rtsam mo snyam du mi sems so //

analyzed: shes rab ni 'di sgom mo snyam du mi sems so // de sbyin pa rlom sems su mi byed / sbyin pas rlom sems su mi byed /

original: bdag ni sbyin pa byed pa'o zhes rlom sems su mi byed do //üîΩde tshul khrims rlom sems su mi byed /üîΩtshul khrims kyis rlom sems su mi byed /

original: bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su mi byed do //
analyzed: bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su mi byed do //

original: bzod pas rlom sems su mi byed /
analyzed: bzod pas rlom sems su mi byed /

analyzed: bdag ni bzod pa dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su mi byed do // de brtson 'grus rlom sems su mi byed /
translated: They do not become proud, thinking, ‚ÄòI am patient.‚ÄôüîΩThey do not become proud because of their perseverance.

original: brtson 'grus kyis rlom sems su mi byed /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyis rlom sems su mi byed /
translated: They do not become proud because of their perseverance.

analyzed: bdag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su mi byed do // de bsam gtan rlom sems su mi byed /

analyzed: bsam gtan gyis rlom sems su mi byed /
translated: They do not become proud because of their concentration.

analyzed: bdag ni bsam gtan pa'o zhes rlom sems su mi byed do // de shes rab rlom sems su mi byed /
translated: They do not become proud, thinking, ‚ÄòI am concentrated.‚ÄôüîΩThey do not become proud because of their wisdom.

analyzed: shes rab kyis rlom sems su mi byed /

original: bdag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su mi byed do //
analyzed: bdag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su mi byed do //

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: de ltar de rnam par mi rtog pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa de dag med de /

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /üîΩde ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /üîΩde ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste /

analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o // de ltar de rnam par mi rtog pas tshul khrims kyi pha @324a *//

original: rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa de dag med de /
analyzed: rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa de dag med de /
translated: In that way, because of nonconceptuality, those conceptualizations do not exist in the perfection of morality.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste /
translated: It is because of this:

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o //
translated: That perfection of morality is not a perfection.

original: de ltar de rnam par mi rtog pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa de dag med de /
analyzed: de ltar de rnam par mi rtog pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa de dag med de /
translated: In that way, because of nonconceptuality, those conceptualizations do not exist in the perfection of patience.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste /
translated: It is because of this:

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o //
translated: That perfection of patience is not a perfection.

original: de ltar de rnam par mi rtog pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa de dag med de /üîΩde ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar de rnam par mi rtog pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa de dag med de / de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: In that way, because of nonconceptuality, those conceptualizations do not exist in the perfection of perseverance.üîΩWhy is that?

original: de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste /
translated: It is because of this:üîΩThat perfection of perseverance is not a perfection.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o //
translated: This perfection of diligence is not a perfection.

original: de ltar de rnam par mi rtog pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa de dag med de /
analyzed: de ltar de rnam par mi rtog pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa de dag med de /
translated: In this way, because of nonconceptuality, those conceptual thoughts are absent in the perfection of meditative concentration.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /üîΩde ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste /
translated: And why?

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o //
translated: It is because this‚Äînamely, the perfection of meditative concentration‚Äîis not a perfection.

original: de ltar de rnam par mi rtog pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa de dag med de /
analyzed: de ltar de rnam par mi rtog pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa de dag med de /
translated: In this way, because of nonconceptuality, those conceptual thoughts are absent in the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /üîΩde ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste /
translated: And why?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o //
translated: It is because this‚Äînamely, the perfection of wisdom‚Äîis not a perfection.

original: de lta'ang yin la /
analyzed: de lta'ang yin la /
translated: And yet,

original: gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de'ang ring du song ba shes shing /
analyzed: gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de'ang ring du song ba shes shing /
translated: the bodhisattva great being who has such an understanding of the perfection of wisdom is also known as having gone far.

original: pha rol shes kyang des rlom sems med de /
analyzed: pha rol shes kyang des rlom sems med de /
translated: And although he knows the other side, he is not proud of that.

original: de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / @324b bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang /
analyzed: de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / @324b bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang /
translated: It is embraced by the perfection of generosity, embraced by the perfection of discipline, embraced by the perfection of patience, embraced by the perfection of diligence,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba dang / nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba dang / nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /
translated: embraced by the perfection of concentration, embraced by the perfection of wisdom, embraced by skillful means, embraced by inner emptiness, embraced by outer emptiness,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /üîΩ'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /
translated: It is embraced by the emptiness of the outer and the inner, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of what is great, the emptiness of the ultimate,üîΩthe emptiness of the conditioned, the emptiness of the unconditioned, the emptiness of what is beyond extremes, the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless,

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /
translated: the emptiness of what is not to be discarded, the emptiness of nature, the emptiness of all things, and the emptiness of their own marks.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /
translated: It is embraced by the emptiness of nonobservation, the emptiness of the absence of an intrinsic nature, the emptiness of all phenomena, the emptiness of defining characteristics, the emptiness of the absence of an intrinsic nature in things, and the emptiness of the ultimate.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa @325a *//
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa @325a *//
translated: It is embraced by the applications of mindfulness,

original: rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dbang po rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / stobs rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /
analyzed: rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dbang po rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / stobs rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /
translated: the right efforts, the legs of miraculous power, the faculties, the powers, the branches of awakening, and the path.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su bzung ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang / bsam gtan bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang / tshad med pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su bzung ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang / bsam gtan bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang / tshad med pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang /
translated: It is embraced by the seven branches of enlightenment, embraced by the eightfold noble path, embraced by the four noble truths, embraced by the four concentrations, embraced by the four immeasurables,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su bzung ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su bzung ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
translated: embraced by the four formless absorptions, embraced by the eight aspects of liberation, embraced by the nine serial steps of meditative absorption, embraced by the emptiness aspect of liberation,

original: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas yongs su bzung ba dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas yongs su bzung ba dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /
translated: It is embraced by the absence of attributes and the absence of aspiration. It is embraced by the superknowledges, embraced by the meditative stabilities, embraced by the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ gateways,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su bzung ba dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang / byams pa chen pos yongs su bzung ba dang / snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung ba dang /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su bzung ba dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang / byams pa chen pos yongs su bzung ba dang / snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung ba dang /
translated: embraced by the ten powers of the tathƒÅgatas, embraced by the four fearlessnesses, embraced by the four detailed and thorough knowledges, embraced by great love, embraced by great compassion,

translated: and is also embraced by the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, by the knowledge of all aspects, by the knowledge of the path, and by the knowledge of all things,üîΩand does not fall to the ≈õrƒÅvaka level

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste /
translated: or to the pratyekabuddha level,

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /

original: ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should they train in the perfection of concentration?

original: ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi /

analyzed: ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi /

analyzed: ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi /
