analyzed: ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should they train in the perfection of generosity?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / 'di la lam dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par 'dod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par 'dod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par 'dod pa dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la lam dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par 'dod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par 'dod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par 'dod pa dang /
translated: ‚ÄúSubh≈´ti, here, bodhisattva great beings who want to train in the perfection of wisdom, who want to train in the perfection of concentration, who want to train in the perfection of perseverance,

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la @326a *//
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la @326a *//
translated: who want to train in the perfection of patience,

original: bslab par 'dod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par 'dod pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par 'dod pas /
analyzed: bslab par 'dod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par 'dod pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par 'dod pas /
translated: those who wish to train in the perfection of patience,üîΩthose who wish to train in the perfection of perseverance,üîΩthose who wish to train in the perfection of concentration,üîΩand those who wish to train in the perfection of wisdom

original: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa /
analyzed: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa /
translated: should follow the spiritual friend who teaches the perfection of wisdom,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa /üîΩbrtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa /
translated: who teaches the perfection of concentration,üîΩwho teaches the perfection of perseverance,

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa /

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa /
translated: who teaches the perfection of moral discipline,üîΩand who teaches the perfection of generosity.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa de dag la bsten par bya'o //üîΩbsnyen par bya'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa de dag la bsten par bya'o // bsnyen par bya'o //
translated: They should serve them,üîΩthey should honor them,

original: bsnyen bkur bar bya'o //
analyzed: bsnyen bkur bar bya'o //
translated: and they should respect them.

original: de dag de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston to //
analyzed: de dag de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston to //
translated: They teach this perfection of wisdom like this:

original: tshur rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: tshur rigs kyi bu /
translated: ‚ÄòCome, son of a good family!

original: sbyin pa gang dang gang sbyin pa de thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig /
analyzed: sbyin pa gang dang gang sbyin pa de thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig /
translated: Whatever generosity you practice, dedicate it all to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: tshur rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: tshur rigs kyi bu /
translated: Come here, son of noble family!

original: tshul khrims gang dang gang srung ba de thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig /
analyzed: tshul khrims gang dang gang srung ba de thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig /
translated: Whatever morality you guard, dedicate it all to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: tshur rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: tshur rigs kyi bu /
translated: Come here, son of noble family!

original: bzod pa gang dang gang sgrub pa de thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig /
analyzed: bzod pa gang dang gang sgrub pa de thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig /
translated: Whatever patience you practice, dedicate it all to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: tshur rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: tshur rigs kyi bu /
translated: Come here, son of noble family!

original: brtson 'grus gang dang gang rtsom pa de thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig /
analyzed: brtson 'grus gang dang gang rtsom pa de thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig /
translated: Whatever effort you undertake, dedicate it all to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: tshur rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: tshur rigs kyi bu /
translated: Come here, son of noble family!
